nodes.description: 2008年8月市场附近公交站发生女性自杀式爆炸，致12人死亡
nodes.support_text: The Central market has been a target of terrorist attacks twice: in 1999, when car explosion killed 52 people, and in 2008, when a female suicide bomber detonated bombs attached to herself at the bus stop near the market, claiming lives of 12 people and injuring 41.

nodes.description: 2010年9月9日市场发生自杀式汽车炸弹袭击，造成17人死亡、160余人受伤
nodes.support_text: The 2010 Vladikavkaz bombing took place at the Central market in Vladikavaz, North Ossetia–Alania, Russia on 9 September 2010 when a suicide car bomber detonated his explosives killing at least 17 and injuring more than 160.

nodes.description: 爆炸现场附近发现并成功拆解第二辆汽车炸弹
nodes.support_text: A second bomb discovered in a car near the site of the first explosion was successfully defused.

nodes.description: 调查发现袭击者头颅遗骸
nodes.support_text: The remains of the suicide attacker's decapitated corpse were discovered.

nodes.description: 俄总统谴责袭击为'恐怖行径'，总理呼吁穆斯林群体参与反极端主义
nodes.support_text: Russia's president, Dmitry Medvedev, condemned the attack as 'monstrous'. The prime minister, Vladimir Putin, said the attack was designed to 'sow enmity between our citizens'.

nodes.description: 确认4名亚美尼亚人（含1名俄罗斯公民）死亡，多人受伤
nodes.support_text: At least 4 ethnic Armenians, including 1 Armenian citizen, were among the dead. Armenians were also among the injured.

edges.support_text: The Central market has been a target of terrorist attacks twice: in 1999, when car explosion killed 52 people, and in 2008, when a female suicide bomber detonated bombs attached to herself at the bus stop near the market, claiming lives of 12 people and injuring 41.
A second bomb discovered in a car near the site of the first explosion was successfully defused.
killing at least 17 and injured more than 160.
The remains of the suicide attacker's decapitated corpse were discovered.
Russia's president, Dmitry Medvedev, condemned the attack as 'monstrous'. The prime minister, Vladimir Putin, said the attack was designed to 'sow enmity between our citizens'.
